entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
